dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, bet you a coffee that Almaty's getting the worst of it on Monday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, bet you a coffee that Almaty's getting the worst of it on Monday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, you're on! Because I just saw, uh, Kazhydromet says thunderstorms and gusty winds there—sounds pretty intense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, you're on! Because I just saw, uh, Kazhydromet says thunderstorms and gusty winds there-sounds pretty intense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Almaty " partly cloudy, occasional rain and thunderstorms, gusty winds during storms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but check out Ust-Kamenogorsk—heavy rain, hail, squalls, and the temperature doesn't even change! Stuck at 15 to 17 all day and night.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but check out Ust-Kamenogorsk-heavy rain, hail, squalls, and the temperature doesn't even change! Stuck at fifteen to seventeen all day and night.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ust-Kamenogorsk " partly cloudy, heavy rain, thunderstorms, hail, and squalls. Gusty wind during storms. 15"17ÂC both at night and during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oof, that's rough. Meanwhile, Shymkent'sitting pretty—partly cloudy, no rain, and up to 28 degrees. Lucky them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oof, that's rough. Meanwhile, Shymkent'sitting pretty-partly cloudy, no rain, and up to twenty eight degrees. Lucky them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And Aktau's also dry, but way cooler, like only 18 to 20 during the day. Coastal vibe, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And Aktau's also dry, but way cooler, like only eighteen to twenty during the day. Coastal vibe, I guess.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But then you've got Atyrau with rain, thunderstorms, and even hail expected. Hail in May? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then you've got Atyrau with rain, thunderstorms, and even hail expected. Hail in May? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Atyrau " partly cloudy, rain, thunderstorms, and hail expected during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Semey's got it bad too—heavy rain sometimes, plus squalls and gusty wind. Not a calm night there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Semey's got it bad too-heavy rain sometimes, plus squalls and gusty wind. Not a calm night there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Semey " partly cloudy, rain (sometimes heavy), thunderstorms, hail, and squalls. Gusty wind during storms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Honestly, seems like central and east Kazakhstan are getting all the drama. Karaganda has storms at night too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Honestly, seems like central and east Kazakhstan are getting all the drama. Karaganda has storms at night too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, western spots like Aktobe and Kostanay are just… dry and mild. Boring weather, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, western spots like Aktobe and Kostanay are just... dry and mild. Boring weather, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Aktobe " partly cloudy, dry. 8"10ÂC at night, 23"25ÂC during the day. Kostanay " partly cloudy, dry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, I'll take boring over hail any day! But Astana's got rain at night, so pack an umbrella if you're out late.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, I'll take boring over hail any day! But Astana's got rain at night, so pack an umbrella if you're out late.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True. And Taldykorgan's similar to Almaty—occasional storms, gusty winds. Must be a mountain thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. And Taldykorgan's similar to Almaty-occasional storms, gusty winds. Must be a mountain thing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Taldykorgan " partly cloudy, occasional rain and thunderstorms, gusty wind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So who wins the coffee? I think Ust-Kamenogorsk takes the prize for most chaotic forecast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So who wins the coffee? I think Ust-Kamenogorsk takes the prize for most chaotic forecast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Fair enough. I still feel bad for anyone in Semey though—thunderstorms AND hail? Double trouble.

dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Guess we're both buying coffee and sympathizing with Kazakhstan right now.
